name: Dardo Caves of Dartial
description:
Dardo is an logic-adventure game I started to make very long ago, inspired by old games from Atari 65XE such as Robbo, Boulder Dash. I was unsure what to do with it, since it is made with old program, and I don't know if it will run on newer systems propely, but finally I decided to upload demo version and see if there will be any people interested in playing my game.

Long ago, some powerful sorcerer hide his treasures from raiders in mysterious caves of Dartial. Many tried to get them, but no one was able  because on caves persist powerful spell which disables entering lower caves without earlier gaining all magic gems. Dardo decided to visit them, and see what he can find.

To finish a cave you must collect all gems and enter "doors". During your adventure you will encounter many objects with different abilities. Dardo have a magical pickaxe that work different depending on object or can warn you if invisible traps or other danger is near.

Currently it is free demo alpha version, containing 10 playable levels in polish and english languages.

By donating you encourage me to make full version - I am now unsure if I should finish full version or not.

Requirements:

Windows 7+*

*not sure if it will work on higher windows systems, since I don't have ability to test on them.
